description: The Omega Team is a group of elite rangers who appeared in the world of "Earth Defense Force 2025" and "Earth Defense Force 4.1: The Shadow of New Despair," known for their flashy colors and high-output lasers. They are stalwart NPCs whose weapons sometimes outpower the EDF4 protagonist. This allows you to play as an EDF4 Ranger using the Omega Team colors. And for his weapon? Well, that goes without saying. Now, let the enemies enjoy the sweet taste of laser.
name: Ranger (EDF4), Omega Team Colors & Special Gear
